content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md::String)
    lines = split(md, "\n")
    start_position = findfirst([l for l in lines if startswith(l, "```julia")])
    if isnothing(start_position)
        return String[]
    end
    end_position = findfirst([l for l in lines[start_position.stop + 1:end]], "```")
    if isnothing(end_position)
        return String[]
    end
    code_blocks = extract_code_blocks(lines, start_position, end_position)
    code = join(code_blocks, "\n")
    return code
end

function extract_code_blocks(lines, start_position, end_position)
    start = start_position.stop + 1
    end_ = end_position.stop
    code_blocks = String[]
    while true
        if lines[start] == "```"
            push!(code_blocks, join(lines[start:end - 1], "\n"))
            end_ += 1
        else
            break
        end
    end
    return code_blocks
end
```
